name: CommandSet
description: Personal command collection for Revit AI assistance

commands.description: Filter elements by custom settings and return their information
Create line-based elements such as walls or ducts from line data
Create point-based elements at specified locations
Create surface-based elements like floors from surface definitions
Apply colors to elements of a category based on parameter values
Perform operations on elements such as select, hide, isolate, color or delete
Tag walls in the active view
List available family types filtered by category and name
Retrieve elements in the current view with optional filters
Get information about the active view
Return information for currently selected elements
Create dimension annotations between elements or points
Compile and run dynamic C# code in Revit
